programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Jack and Will decide to buy a holiday home together in a new up-and-coming district, but discover the area is not as amenable to the gay community as they had imagined. American comedy, starring Eric McCormack and Sean Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Will goads Grace into seeing his therapist, but is stricken with pangs of jealousy when he learns the two women have formed a close friendship. Meanwhile, Karen acquires a pair of glasses and begins to see everything more clearly - including Jack's many flaws. Sharon Stone guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra decides it is Ray's turn to take charge of birth control, but he backs out of having a vasectomy and buys a less drastic form of contraception - which Frank somehow mistakes for sweets. American comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Peter Boyle.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert grows tired of the lack of privacy at his parents' house and moves out, only to end up living with a couple who are uncannily similar to Marie and Frank.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Joe spends the night in Daphne's room, causing a shocked Frasier's mind to work overtime and Niles to become consumed by jealousy. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles takes dancing lessons in preparation for a posh society ball, but his date falls ill at the last minute, so he asks Daphne to go with him instead. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Show Where Diane Comes Back.
programme.desc: Diane visits Seattle for the opening night of her new play, which turns out to be a mixed blessing for Frasier. Although hurt over being jilted, he still harbours feelings for her - but they disappear once he attends the dress rehearsal. Shelley Long guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny is left in a difficult professional situation when a doctor (guest star Billy Bob Thornton) turns up at her door following her flirtatious sales technique, so the guys try to help her out. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette have a dispute over whether female scientists should flaunt their sexuality to try to get ahead at work. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang re-creates a prom night on the roof of the apartment building when the girls decide they would like to re-enact their evenings with their current partners. However, Sheldon feels under pressure to take part in all the romantic traditions, and Howard worries about who Stuart will bring as his date. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart runs away from home at Thanksgiving and ends up in a shelter for down-and-outs, where he is interviewed by a TV news crew - much to the horror of Homer and Marge.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Parental rivalry between the Simpsons and long-suffering neighbours the Flanders adds spice to a junior golf tournament as Bart and Todd go head to head. The two boys decide to throw the match by agreeing on a tie, but it is their fathers who pay the price.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Cornwall compete to throw the perfect dinner party, with Zaya and Damian, Kelly and Jon, and Emma and Gavin battling it out for the £1,000 cash prize.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: High-end pawnbroker James hopes to sell a Second World War Tiger Moth biplane for £70,000, while two different diamond rings bought for £22,000 give the Prestige Pawnbrokers team a headache. Plus, a lord and lady try to sell some luxury handbags and a guitar signed by members of the Rolling Stones.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley host as contestants pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers. Helen Fospero presides in Dictionary Corner, alongside Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: The Question Jury
programme.desc: Tension mounts and loyalties are put to the test as two of the jurors go head to head in a battle to win the money.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Scarlette Douglas helps Martyn and Anne Golesworthy find a holiday home on the Greek island of Naxos, which holds a special place in their hearts as the place they got married.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to the Tarr Farm Inn on Exmoor, where Hilary Lester and Stacey Wade are proud of their five-star standards. However, Peter is on the warpath after his feedback.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Day four in Cardiff is hosted by Michelle, who takes a risk with the third serving of lamb this week - and when she sets a fun challenge, she ends up being accused of cheating.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart, Milhouse, Nelson and Ralph are `discovered' by record producer LT Smash and recruited as singers in a boy band, but Lisa begins to suspect the mogul's motives may not be entirely above board. Featuring the guest voices of 'N Sync.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mac and Neeta have a serious talk, and Tegan and Leela search for information on Courtney's baby. Meanwhile, Marnie tricks James into forgiving her with Myra's help and he invites her back to live with him.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Animal Rescue Live: Supervet Special
programme.desc: Steve Jones, Kate Quilton and Noel Fitzpatrick continue with the week-long appeal to rehome all the animals in Newcastle Dog & Cat Shelter, encouraging would-be owners to consider them first over buying a pet. Many more rescue centres across the country are also taking part, with the team following adoptions as they happen.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diana's `Wicked' Stepmother
programme.desc: An examination of the turbulent relationship between Diana, Princess of Wales and her formidable stepmother Raine Spencer, who rose from humble origins with the help of her larger-than-life mother, the novelist Barbara Cartland, to become a countess and a member of the royal family. Raine was a divisive figure, who was doted on by her husband Johnnie Spencer but loathed by Diana and her siblings. Yet as the princess's marriage collapsed, she reached out to her stepmother for support, marking a change in the women's relationship.(n)

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: The atmosphere remains hostile with the community effectively split into two - a mixed group in the summer camp and an all-male posse living in a valley in the woods. To make matters worse, the Valley Boys refuse to share their food, but when vet Rob takes issue with their behaviour, he ends up making a decision that leaves girlfriend Katie furious.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Headteacher Emma arrives in resus having been in a collision with a bus while cycling home from the school she works at. As she is treated, her husband Mick reflects on being informed what had happened. Meanwhile, 33-year-old Josh is treated for severe back pain, and 87-year-old Pamela is examined for a possible blood clot in her leg, and tells the doctors about her childhood in London during the Blitz.(n)

programme.title: Get a House for Free
programme.desc: Landlord Marco Robinson - who owns a business and property empire worth £25million - is looking to give away a three-bedroom flat in Preston, worth around £120,000. Cameras follow him as he seeks the right person or people who he thinks will benefit most from the property.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The documentary follows Kirstine and Phil, who have not spent a day apart in four years, but following an emergency during labour the pair find themselves separated. Cameras also focus on independent businesswoman Tyla. While awaiting the arrival of her third child, she starts to reconsider her romantic future. And although Spanish nurses Carlota and Javier epitomise the perfect relationship, the pair realise that labour can be challenging even for the best of partnerships.(n)

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: Boatman Anton and carpenter Raph find themselves ostracised by almost every other member of the Eden community, having built an isolated house in the woods. Anton bears the brunt of their frustrations and anger; as there is a widely-held belief that the pair are not contributing to the wider group, yet are using items earmarked for the whole community - something they deny. Oli decides to confront Raph and Anton - the resulting showdown boils over into a dramatic conclusion that changes the group for ever.(n)

programme.title: Tried and Tasted: The Ultimate Shopping List
programme.desc: Joining chef Michel Roux Jr are First Dates love ambassador Fred Sirieix, food critic Jay Rayner, baker Stacie Stewart and TV presenter Lucy Alexander. The panellists choose between four different brands of prawn cocktail, margherita pizza and vanilla ice cream. There is also a public taste test of oven chips.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples hoping to relocate to Surrey. Sonia and Daniel Alderson-Smith have a sizeable budget to find a new property in East Molesey - but have also decided there are only 18 streets on which they will consider living. Meanwhile, Phil offers advice to Maeve and Peter Dunne, who are unsure about which part of the county to move to.(n)

programme.title: Double Your House for Half the Money
programme.sub-title: Sarah Beeny's Double Your House for Half the Money.
programme.desc: The property developer visits Great Baddow in Essex, where Ian and Claire hope to double the size of their four-bedroom house and make it a multi-generational home with separate floors for their parents, children and themselves. Sarah also meets Paul and Mimi, who relocated from London after the riots of summer 2011. They are now settled in Great Bowden, Leicestershire, and hope to extend and rework the original layout of their 1960s home.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: The six transporters bid to move three hovercraft 291 miles from Warrington in Cheshire to Sandwich in Kent for £8,000. Meanwhile, Shahbaz picks up a gramophone on his tuk tuk, and Raymond and Grant have problems fitting their model railway load in their van.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley host as contestants pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers. Helen Fospero presides in Dictionary Corner, alongside Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.sub-title: It's a Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad World.
programme.desc: Jack arranges a date on behalf of Will, while Grace attends her father Martin's birthday party and convinces Karen to come along. Unfortunately, no one else turns up, and the event proves to be a wash-out. Alan Arkin, Lee Majors and Debbie Reynolds guest.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: A brush with death prompts Grace to write her will. Determined to do things properly, she enlists Will's legal expertise to make sure she is fair when bequeathing her money. Meanwhile, Jack is forced to reassess his teaching methods. Eric McCormack and Debra Messing star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Jealousy rears its ugly head when inexperienced Andy achieves Ray's lifelong ambition - having an article published in a prestigious sports magazine.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert and Amy split up and Ray is left to take the blame for making disparaging remarks about marriage. American comedy, starring Ray Romano and Brad Garrett.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: A Word to the Wise Guy.
programme.desc: A shady character helps the Crane brothers get Maris out of a spot of legal trouble - then demands they return the favour by persuading his girlfriend to marry him. Comedy, guest starring Harris Yulin, with Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles is left jumping for joy by an exciting proposal from Maris, while Frasier suggests the family tries something different to mark the leap year. However, all his efforts end in disaster. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Disgruntled to learn his favourite table at Cafe Nervosa has been commandeered by a rude fellow customer, Frasier resorts to physical violence to reclaim it - but later regrets losing his temper.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon panics when Leonard announces he has to go into hospital for surgery, and the impending divorce of Raj's parents motivates Howard and Bernadette to work on their own marriage. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon bids an emotional goodbye to Fun with Flags as he and Amy record the final instalment of the internet show. Leonard, Howard and Raj clear out the office of a recently deceased professor and take a peek at his research. Guest starring LeVar Burton.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: An evening's car-crushing entertainment brings out the daredevil in Bart - who decides to try some death-defying stunts of his own, culminating in a skateboard jump over a gorge. Luckily, Homer is on hand to bring him down to earth.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Long-standing TV personality Krusty the Clown reaches the end of the road, his days of entertaining kids quashed by an alternative show - prompting his famous friends to come to the rescue. Animation, with the voices of Elizabeth Taylor, Hugh Hefner, Bette Midler and the Red Hot Chili Peppers.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Cornwall take part in the culinary challenge, with the first hosts being competitive duo Marie and Gavin, who are more than happy to receive a glowing response from one of their fellow competitors. Next up are 25-year-old Becki and her 55-year-old partner Barry, whose age-gap romance leaves their guests with a lot of questions. Finally, Sam and Nick throw the last party, but their rivals are uneasy ahead of arriving at their home, since the pair spent much of their time during a previous engagement discussing their plans for surviving a zombie apocalypse.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: High-end pawnshop boss James test drives a home-made electric bike, while the Prestige Pawnbrokers team are put to the test when a £30,000 diamond ring arrives with the wrong paperwork. Meanwhile, a bespoke DJ van comes to HQ with a large price tag, and a bishop wants to sell a Salvador Dali sculpture to fund his children's charity in Kenya.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Helen Fospero joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: The Question Jury
programme.desc: This is the juror's last chance to win up to £10,000, and new juror Paul joins the debate, but must convince the other members of the jury to vote in his favour. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin shows Southampton couple David and Sonia five fantastic properties for their budget of £100,000 in the Almeria province of southern Spain.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It is the last day of the competition and there is tension in the air, as Cholmeley Arms hosts John and Lesley want to get to the bottom of Peter's comments.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final night of the competition in Cardiff and tonight's host Suzanne is pinning her hopes on an evening of sophistication and fine French cuisine.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer uncovers a plan to move his beloved Springfield Isotopes baseball team to New Mexico, so he takes desperate measures to keep them in town and goes on hunger strike in protest. With the guest voice of Stacy Keach.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Maxine plans a dinner party for the family but things quickly turn chaotic, and Neeta is made to feel guilty by Mac, and later she gives Hunter some devastating news.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Animal Rescue Live: Supervet Special
programme.desc: Steve Jones, Kate Quilton and Professor Noel Fitzpatrick wrap up their week-long animal rescue series live from the Newcastle Dog & Cat Shelter. Over the course of the week they have met furry friends from all over the country and tonight even more of them will make their way home to start a happier life with their new-found families. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by environmentalist and former Vice President of the United States Al Gore for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. The trio offer their own unique insight into some of the most difficult and delicate issues in modern Britain, and answer that most important of questions: Is it OK? Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: The community finally come together to celebrate Christmas Day, but Katie spends the majority of the day alone, still seething at the 'Valley Boys'. In the final days, the two groups' desire to mark their year-long achievement brings them together for one last hurrah, as they gather for a series of bonfires on the dunes before splitting for their last night. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents 50 clips from the internet showcasing the funniest and greatest alternative sporting and athletic heroes and fails. Featuring cats doing a workout, a woman who laughs her way to a six-pack and a weightlifter with a unique hands-free technique.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Zuzu wants to find Speedy Sam the turtle, but Alma wants to try out her new picnic set, so Poppy proposes a compromise.(n)

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Children's animation following the adventures of a family of puffins living on a wild and beautiful Irish island. Narrated by Chris O'Dowd.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The young rabbit finds a wounded bird and decides to look after it. But after Feather recovers, he flies off. Where has Simon's new friend gone?.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Muck tries to help Mr Bentley by being his chauffeur for the day, but discovers he cannot do two jobs at once.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Paul Binski chronicles the history of Britain's religious art, examining the legacies of two wealthy industrialists of the 17th and 18th centuries who demonstrated a flamboyant taste for kitsch in the baroque forms of churches in Great Witley, Worcestershire, and London's Little Stanmore.(n)

programme.desc: An alcoholic cop is fired from the LAPD and starts a new life in a Boston suburb, where the town board recruits him as chief of police. Detective thriller, starring Tom Selleck, Stephanie March and Stephen Baldwin. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: 20 Moments
programme.desc: Lauren Laverne presents a countdown of some of the most memorable moments from the decade, a period shaped by the rise of reality TV and social media. World-changing events in the headlines included the election of Barack Obama, the 9/11 terrorist attacks and the introduction of the Civil Partnership Act to the UK. Gnarls Barkley made musical history when Crazy went to number one on downloads alone, while the England cricket team regained the Ashes for the first time in 18 years.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Emma Willis presents the first live eviction show of the series. As usual, she presents yesterday's highlights before revealing which of the renowned residents will be leaving tonight and talking to her about being cooped up with their fellow famous faces.(n)

programme.title: Make or Break
programme.desc: Tensions on the Mexican resort continue to rise, as the participants get physical with their latest partners. After fleeing from a sex therapy session in tears, Holly now faces further turmoil as Karl gets closer to Abbi. Meanwhile, warring duo Elle and Andy make the ultimate decision.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, featuring gossip, chat and features from the house. Guests and the studio audience discuss tonight's eviction, debating whether the right housemate has left.(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this clever, offbeat Western(n)

programme.title: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: Vivid account of a youth who finds few opportunities after returning from Vietnam, and plots to heist a truck carrying Federal Reserve money(n)

programme.title: Traders
programme.desc: A man's business goes under, threatening to derail his posh existence. In a desperate attempt to keep his life as he knows it, he agrees to cash out his entire life savings and put it all on the line in a diabolical, winner-takes-all fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Hamlet 2
programme.desc: Comedy about a failed actor turned drama teacher who, in a final and deluded attempt to make an impact, sets about creating a controversial and 'inspirational' sequel to William Shakespeare's Hamlet(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: This outlandish comedy set in the golden age of showbiz centers on a slick Hollywood fixer named Eddie Mannix, who is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom. Mannix must race to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Rock Star
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in this modern-day fairy tale about the lead singer of a heavy-metal tribute band who joins the real group when its front man quits, and immediately gets in way over his head in a dizzying world of sex, drugs, and rock and roll. Jennifer Aniston, Timothy Spall, Dominic West, Jason Bonham, Timothy Olyphant, Jason Flemyng(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu reprise their roles in this dazzling stunt-filled sequel, in which the trio takes on a former Angel who has gone over to the dark side(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Two Puerto Rican NYC cops (Luis Guzman and Edgar Garcia) are asked by a pair of French fashion designers (Alice Taglioni and Frederic Anscombre) to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag. Rosie Perez and Rosario Dawson co-star. Directed by Ian Edelman(n)

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: The mismatched cops variation of the buddy comedy genre gets taken out of mothballs for this farce directed by longtime Adam Sandler collaborator Dennis Dugan. Martin Lawrence and Steve Zahn star, respectively, as Earl Montgomery, a loudmouthed police academy reject, and Hank Rafferty, a mild-mannered cop who is disgraced and dismissed from his job. Having met once before on a traffic stop, the two men are less than thrilled to be paired together as security guards. When the two men discover a complex smuggling scheme, however, they put aside their animosity to investigate the criminal scheme. They soon learn that the illegal enterprise involves a mastermind named Nash (Eric Roberts) and a new, virtually indestructible metal that's worth a fortune. Unable to persuade Hank's former police department superiors that they're onto a huge case, the two partners must devise a way to expose the sophisticated scam and bring down Nash on their own. National Security co-stars Colm Feore, Bill Duke, Timothy Busfield, and Wayne Knight(n)

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: After his wife gives birth to a stillborn child, the American ambassador to Britain switches two kids in their hospital cribs. What he doesn't know is that little Damien is the Anti-Christ. Seminal 70s horror(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: A survivalist (Christian Bale) teams up with a military man (Matthew McConaughey) to slay fire-breathing dragons in postapocalyptic 2020(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror thriller, an unconventional exorcist battles a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Academy Award-winning Exorcist director William Friedkin scuttles deep into the darkest recesses of the traumatized human psyche with this tale of a lonely bartender haunted by the long-ago disappearance of her young son, and the paranoia that emerges when she enters into a tentative relationship with a deeply disturbed drifter. Adapted from the off-Broadway play by Tracy Letts, Bug centers on Agnes (Ashley Judd), who tends bar alongside pal R.C. (Lynn Collins), and has recently moved into a shoddy roadside motel in hopes of avoiding her menacing and recently paroled ex-husband, Jerry (Harry Connick Jr.). Upon making the acquaintance of subdued former soldier Peter (Michael Shannon, repeating his stage role), a veteran of the first Gulf War, Agnes finally senses that things are looking up. Quietly charming despite his melancholy aura, Peter soon reveals to Agnes that he contracted a "bug" while serving in the Middle East, and that it may have been deliberately administered as part of a secret military medical experiment. Convinced that the microscopic insects are quickly multiplying just under the surface of his skin and that they have now infected Agnes as well, Peter soon descends into a psychotic rage as he resorts to increasingly desperate measures to purge himself of the offending subdermal arthropods(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Kane gives a killer performance as a deranged, hulking psychopath who terrorizes eight teens working to rehab a decrepit hotel. It's no-holds-barred mayhem as the murderer employs a variety of different weapons and instruments to dispatch his victims. Directed by Gregory Dark. WWE head Vince McMahon serves as executive producer. Steven Vidler, Christina Vidal, Michael J. Pagan, Samantha Noble, Cecily Polson, Luke Pegler, Penny McNamee, Craig Horner(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic (Elizabeth Reaser) is stunned when she obtains a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for her business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her nine-year-old daughter (Lulu Wilson). Directed by Mike Flanagan, this horror sequel co-stars Annalise Basso, Henry Thomas, and Doug Jones(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: Magnum 44 thriller. In his fourth screen outing as 'Dirty' Harry Callahan, Clint Eastwood tracks down a rape victim who is killing off the men responsible(n)

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: After infiltrating a crime syndicate, an undercover FBI agent lands in prison, where he tries to thwart a plot to recover stolen gold(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: In this galvanizing feminist drama, a working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalized when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Multimillion-selling recording artist Britney Spears makes the transition to the big screen with this teen road trip romantic comedy, co-produced by the film branch of the entity that first brought her pop stardom, MTV. Crossroads casts Spears as Lucy, the shy valedictorian of her high school graduating class. On the night of their prom, Lucy and her once-close childhood friends -- the prim and proper Kit (Zoe Saldana) and the tomboyish, five-months-pregnant Mimi (Taryn Manning) -- reunite to dig up a time capsule they buried together as little girls. Mimi's about to make good on her childhood dreams; she's leaving their small Southern town for hopes of fame and fortune in Los Angeles. Though Lucy and Kit are reluctant to join her, they decide to tag along at the last minute, agreeing to be chauffeured by Mimi's just-out-of-jail friend, Ben (Anson Mount). As they trek across the country, plagued by car problems, unsanitary motels, and petty bickering, the three friends reveal meaningful secrets to each other, and Lucy begins to realize that the handsome, reticent Ben might just be the guy for her(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: In this charming sequel to the 2002 sleeper hit, Toula's family throws an even bigger Greek wedding for her parents, who learn they never officially tied the knot. Meanwhile, she deals with a daughter who's eager to escape from her overbearing clan(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: Classic sidesplittingly funny comedy stars John Belushi as the head of the delinquent Delta House fraternity that the dean of Faber College plans to rid his campus of(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Daring adventurer Rick returns to Egypt for a second crack at evil high priest Imhotep. But this time, the devious shaman has enlisted the diabolical services of the Scorpion King and his army of a thousand jackal warriors(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Based upon Mark Millar's explosive graphic novel series and helmed by stunning visualist director Timur Bekmambetov, Wanted stars Academy Award-winners Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman as members of a secret fraternity of assassins. James McAvoy portrays a slacker who is unexpectedly recruited to join the ranks of these elite fighters. As his powers and skills increase under their tutelage, however, he begins to waver between heroism and vengeance, and discovers that there is more to his dangerous associates than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.desc: After his wife gives birth to a stillborn child, the American ambassador to Britain switches two kids in their hospital cribs. What he doesn't know is that little Damien is the Anti-Christ. Seminal 70s horror(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: A survivalist (Christian Bale) teams up with a military man (Matthew McConaughey) to slay fire-breathing dragons in postapocalyptic 2020(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror thriller, an unconventional exorcist battles a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Academy Award-winning Exorcist director William Friedkin scuttles deep into the darkest recesses of the traumatized human psyche with this tale of a lonely bartender haunted by the long-ago disappearance of her young son, and the paranoia that emerges when she enters into a tentative relationship with a deeply disturbed drifter. Adapted from the off-Broadway play by Tracy Letts, Bug centers on Agnes (Ashley Judd), who tends bar alongside pal R.C. (Lynn Collins), and has recently moved into a shoddy roadside motel in hopes of avoiding her menacing and recently paroled ex-husband, Jerry (Harry Connick Jr.). Upon making the acquaintance of subdued former soldier Peter (Michael Shannon, repeating his stage role), a veteran of the first Gulf War, Agnes finally senses that things are looking up. Quietly charming despite his melancholy aura, Peter soon reveals to Agnes that he contracted a "bug" while serving in the Middle East, and that it may have been deliberately administered as part of a secret military medical experiment. Convinced that the microscopic insects are quickly multiplying just under the surface of his skin and that they have now infected Agnes as well, Peter soon descends into a psychotic rage as he resorts to increasingly desperate measures to purge himself of the offending subdermal arthropods(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Kane gives a killer performance as a deranged, hulking psychopath who terrorizes eight teens working to rehab a decrepit hotel. It's no-holds-barred mayhem as the murderer employs a variety of different weapons and instruments to dispatch his victims. Directed by Gregory Dark. WWE head Vince McMahon serves as executive producer. Steven Vidler, Christina Vidal, Michael J. Pagan, Samantha Noble, Cecily Polson, Luke Pegler, Penny McNamee, Craig Horner(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic (Elizabeth Reaser) is stunned when she obtains a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for her business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her nine-year-old daughter (Lulu Wilson). Directed by Mike Flanagan, this horror sequel co-stars Annalise Basso, Henry Thomas, and Doug Jones(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact

programme.title: Half Past Dead

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: In this galvanizing feminist drama, a working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalized when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Multimillion-selling recording artist Britney Spears makes the transition to the big screen with this teen road trip romantic comedy, co-produced by the film branch of the entity that first brought her pop stardom, MTV. Crossroads casts Spears as Lucy, the shy valedictorian of her high school graduating class. On the night of their prom, Lucy and her once-close childhood friends -- the prim and proper Kit (Zoe Saldana) and the tomboyish, five-months-pregnant Mimi (Taryn Manning) -- reunite to dig up a time capsule they buried together as little girls. Mimi's about to make good on her childhood dreams; she's leaving their small Southern town for hopes of fame and fortune in Los Angeles. Though Lucy and Kit are reluctant to join her, they decide to tag along at the last minute, agreeing to be chauffeured by Mimi's just-out-of-jail friend, Ben (Anson Mount). As they trek across the country, plagued by car problems, unsanitary motels, and petty bickering, the three friends reveal meaningful secrets to each other, and Lucy begins to realize that the handsome, reticent Ben might just be the guy for her(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2

In this outing, the guys climb up on the town's water tower to paint a huge marijuana leaf. Dissatisfied with the results, Kelso (Ashton Kutcher) scrambles up the tower again, only to plunge painfully to earth. Rather than take Kelso to a hospital, Eric (Topher Grace) reasons that his mom, Kitty (Debra Jo Rupp), a nurse, is in closer proximity. programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Crime Family. The Mob is demystified in the A&E program American Justice: Crime Family. Host Bill Kurtis takes the viewer into the heart of the New York underworld to examine the long arms of the Genovese family. Started when Vito Genovese worked under Lucky Luciano, the notorious family has a firm grip on syndicated crime. A&E presents rare footage of the gangster clan and its shady leaders. For years, police have pursued the Genovese, but they remain frustratingly immune to arrest. Hear from the prosecutors who have made their capture a full-time job and the historians who will explain why the Genovese will never die(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story. This documentary, part of the American Justice series from A&E, examines the Texas death penalty case of Karla Faye Walker. Narrated by American Justice host and producer Bill Kurtis, this episode goes inside the investigation of the two murders that Walker and her boyfriend Daniel Ryan Garrett committed. The trial of Walker is shown through exclusive footage. After the conviction, American Justice follows her through her daily life, showing her prison surroundings and talking with her about her crimes. Sentenced to death, while Walker was waiting to be executed, she became a born-again Christian. Her lawyers used this transformation as leverage to try to get her death sentence reduced to life in prison. Their attempts were unsuccessful and Walker was killed by lethal injection in February 1998. American Justice also shows interviews with lawyers and law enforcement professionals who knew Walker(n)

programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part series finale, bringing to an end Britain's longest-running police procedural drama, which has been broadcast in 55 countries. programme.title: Bring It On
programme.desc: The hard work, dedication, and personal politics behind "rah rah rah!" and "sis boom bah!" go under the microscope in this engaging teen comedy. Torrance Shipman (Kirsten Dunst) discovers that being captain of her San Diego high school's six-time championship-winning cheerleading squad is more complicated than she had imagined. Torrance's parents want her to spend more time on her homework, her boyfriend wants her to spend more time with him, and she learns that the squad's former captain stole some of their best routines from other teams -- and that Isis (Gabrielle Union), captain of a top squad at a crosstown, inner-city high school, plans to fight back this year. To make things worse, when one of the cheerleaders is injured, Torrance is forced to replace her with Missy (Eliza Dushku), a cynical new kid who is involved only because the school doesn't offer gymnastics. In the midst of this chaos, with the national championship around the corner, Torrance couldn't have picked a worse time to fall in love with Cliff (Jesse Bradford), a classmate who cares a lot more about punk rock than school spirit. Dunst trained with a cheerleading squad for her role, though a double performed the more complicated stunts(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: The U Part 2. Chronicling University of Miami football from the low of NCAA sanctions in the mid-'90s to the high of the 2001 National Championship; to the new controversy of a booster's Ponzi scheme to win favor with the program. Directed by Billy Corben(n)

programme.title: College Football Playoff Semifinal: Fiesta Bowl

programme.title: College Football Playoff National Championship
programme.desc: The offensive firepower, excitement and surprises of the 2016 College Football Playoff National Championship at University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Arizona. All of the thrilling plays from Alabama's 45-40 victory over the ACC Conference champion Clemson Tigers are included, as well as analysis from the big game and the postgame trophy presentations. Key moments include Adam Griffith's momentum-shifting second-half onside kick with the score tied at 24 apiece, and two lengthy touchdowns catches from Crimson Tide tight end (and the game's Offensive MVP) O.J. Howard(n)

programme.desc: A daily dose of college football news, features, analysis, game previews and studio discussion, plus on-campus reports(n)

programme.desc: A daily dose of college football news, features, analysis, game previews and studio discussion, plus on-campus reports(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Youngstown Boys. An exploration of the class and power dynamics in college sports through the interconnected journeys of one-time dynamic running back Maurice Clarett and former elite head coach Jim Tressel. Clarett and Tressel emerged from opposite sides of the tracks in Youngstown, Ohio, and then joined up for a magical season at Ohio State University in 2002 that produced the first national football championship for the school in over 30 years. Shortly after, Clarett was suspended from college football and began a downward spiral that ended with a prison term(n)

programme.title: SEC Storied
programme.desc: The Book of Manning. The story of football's Manning family, focusing not only on the careers of Ole Miss star Archie and his NFL sons Peyton and Eli, but on the sudden death of Archie's father and its impact on his approach to fatherhood. Olivia and oldest son Cooper also appear, along with numerous friends and relatives. John Goodman narrates(n)

programme.title: Nixon's National Champs
programme.desc: Chronicling the 1969 college football season in which Presdient Richard Nixon controversally declared the winner of the Dec. 6 Texas-Arkansas game to be the "national champion." Penn State finished the season unbeaten along with the Longhorns(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The first of two episodes exploring the Indian Ocean, which accounts for 13 per cent of Earth's surface and covers 26 million square miles. The expedition visits a `coral nursery', one of the few places in the world where an extraordinary technique is being used to repair damaged reefs. Paul Rose and the team also head to a small community in Mozambique where shark fishing is an established practice.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: The life cycle of the indricothere, a distant relative of the rhino, which grew up to seven metres tall, making it the largest land animal ever to have lived. Narrated by Kenneth Branagh.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Reanimating Australopitheci, one of the first apes to walk upright and considered by anthropologists to be among humankind's earliest forebears. This documentary follows the fortunes of a tribe as its members wander the Ethiopian plains in search of a new home. Along the way they encounter weird and wonderful beasts, the most terrible of which is a sabre-toothed cat with a taste for simian flesh. Narrated by Kenneth Branagh.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: In Australia's Northern Territories, Steve Backshall encounters one of nature's most deadly predators - the saltwater crocodile.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall heads for India, where he goes on the trail of the saw-scaled viper. He also gets too close to the razor-sharp claws of the sloth bear.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the Ngogo forest in Uganda, to study the largest chimpanzee group in the world defending their territory. The parasitic fungi cordyceps and creatures including the flying colugo, red crab spiders and blue birds of paradise are also observed by the naturalist in jungles around the world.(n)

programme.desc: Looking at how the interconnected ecosystems and species in the Bahamas depend on each other in order to survive. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Documentary focusing on the lives of Australian creatures.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: In the second of two episodes examining the Indian Ocean, Paul Rose, Philippe Cousteau Jr, Dr Lucy Blue and Tooni Mahto explore the impact the ocean's tides and currents have on coastal areas. They join a group of scientists working on an experiment to predict extreme weather, and dive down to a coral colony - an environment in which they can learn about changes in the planet's climate.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Documentary breathing new life into the smilodon, the largest of all sabre-toothed cats, which found itself pitted against new enemies in the form of the giant ground sloth and terrifying birds. The programme tells the story of a male facing a harsh existence as it struggles to survive alone after being excluded from its social group.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Re-creating the freezing wastelands of the Ice Age 30,000 years ago, as worsening winter conditions force a mammoth herd to head south for the relative safety of an Alpine valley. The journey is fraught with danger as frozen bogs line the path and their every move is watched by the predatory eyes of a hungry cave lion, while a group of Neanderthals lies in ambush in preparation for the biggest hunt of the year.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall seeks out a tiger in India with the help of locals and along the way encounters another endangered creature - the gharial crocodile.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Creatures that inhabit the Gomantong cave system in Malaysia, including cockroaches, scutagera centipedes, wrinkle-lipped bats and tiger leeches.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Following the epic journey of a humpback whale and its calf as they travel from a tropical paradise to the species' great feeding ground in the icy polar seas. David Attenborough also observes footage of colonies of seabirds in the Arabian desert and surfing dolphins in Australia that swim onto the beach to catch their fish.(n)

programme.title: Oceans

programme.title: Super Giant Animals
programme.desc: Steve Backshall travels across the world to encounter the largest animals he can find and discover the remarkable things their size enables them to do. Highlights include Steve swimming with Nile crocodiles in Botswana, dodging two-ton elephant seals in California and diving with sperm whales in the Caribbean.(n)

programme.desc: Ice rescue swimmer Matt Booth finds out if his partner has given birth.(n)

programme.title: Breaking Ice
programme.desc: The lowest ever recorded levels of sea ice gives the Healy access to the sea floor for dredging.(n)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: In this thriller, Ashley Judd plays Elizabeth Parsons, who is convicted of murdering her husband and sentenced to a long stretch in prison. After Elizabeth has spent six years behind bars, it turns out that her husband is still alive: he faked his own death as part of an insurance scam, and Elizabeth is soon released. However, Elizabeth's feelings for her husband can hardly be described as warm, and she wants custody of her son. Elizabeth's parole officer (Tommy Lee Jones) wonders if she might try to make his murder a real thing after all, especially since the law states a person cannot be convicted of the same crime twice. Double Jeopardy was directed by Bruce Beresford, from a screenplay by Douglas S. Cook and David Weisberg(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: Hollywood heart-throbs Michelle Pfeiffer and George Clooney fall for one another in this old-fashioned romantic New York comedy about a pair of mismatched professionals. Melanie Parker (Pfeiffer) is a single parent and professional architect who somehow manages to combine the skills of her high-flying career with those of a supermum to her young son. Jack Taylor (Clooney), meanwhile, is a newspaper columnist who takes custody of his daughter every other weekend. On this particular fine day, Melanie, Jack and their children are going to be thrown together by circumstance for one chaotic day in which they will lose each other, miss meetings, jeopardise their careers - and find true love!(n)

programme.title: The World Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Suave British secret agent James Bond is embroiled in an all-action race to defuse an international power struggle as the world's oil supply hangs in the balance. Following the murder of a tycoon, 007 becomes bodyguard to the tycoon's daughter, who has been targeted by a psychotic terrorist(n)

programme.title: The X-Files
programme.desc: Big-screen version of the hit sci-fi series about two FBI agents who investigate cases that defy rational explanation. The agents are closer than they have ever been to proving the existence of extraterrestrial life but there are forces out there desperate to stop them. The massive cover-up that ensues leads the duo from the desert of Texas to a remote outpost in the frozen wilderness before they discover the truth(n)

programme.title: The Best of Times
programme.desc: Small-town banker Robin Williams has never been able to live down the fact that he dropped an important pass during a crucial high-school football game. Likewise tainted for life is the team's star quarterback Kurt Russell, now a garage owner. Fed up with living his life under a cloud, Williams hits upon a brilliant idea: he will stage a rematch-13 years after the fact--with the members of the rival team. Trouble beckons when Williams' father-in-law announces that he's rooting for the opposition. Williams is determined to win, and in pursuit of that goal he pushes his former teammates to hitherto untapped brilliance. Directed by Roger Spottiswood, The Best of Times was written by Ron Shelton, future writer/director of such delightful sports films as Bull Durham, White Men Can't Jump and Tin Cup; it was Shelton, in fact, who directed most of Best of Times' climactic football game(n)

programme.title: A Good Year
programme.desc: In this charming and romantic tale, a workaholic London investment broker inherits a vineyard in France, and finds his life changing for the better(n)

programme.title: The World Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Suave British secret agent James Bond is embroiled in an all-action race to defuse an international power struggle as the world's oil supply hangs in the balance. programme.desc: Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: British agent James Bond investigates the disappearance of an Anglo-American space shuttle which has fallen into the hands of a billionaire megalomaniac intent on world domination. Along the way, Bond has to contend with giant, steel-toothed hitman Jaws before stowing away on a flight to a space station being used as a colony to breed a genetically pure race(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Injury. While Cam deals with a potentially career-ending injury, he meets a woman who could be Miss Right; and Reggie begins to think he made a mistake taking on Jupitor as a client(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Date. A smitten Cam plans a very special first date with Allison, while Uncle Julius goes on a disturbing ride with the police and M-Chuck uses her therapy revelations to drive her mother on a guilt trip(n)

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: Director Carl Reiner takes the chalk-and-cheese romantic comedy and takes it into the classroom. Mark Harmon is a high school teacher stuck with a summer teaching remedial English to a bunch of misfits while just down the hall is fellow teacher Kirstie Alley who loathes his and his methods equally. But as the summer wears on and, by hook and crook, Harmon manages to dun information into his charges (though not without various disasters), so her attitude starts to mellow(n)

programme.title: Up in Smoke
programme.desc: When a series of mishaps result in their deportation to Mexico, Cheech and Chong unintentionally agree to smuggle a van made entirely out of marijuana across the border(n)

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: British agent James Bond investigates the disappearance of an Anglo-American space shuttle which has fallen into the hands of a billionaire megalomaniac intent on world domination. Along the way, Bond has to contend with giant, steel-toothed hitman Jaws before stowing away on a flight to a space station being used as a colony to breed a genetically pure race(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Casper Van Dien, Dina Meyer, Denise Richards, Jake Busey, Neil Patrick Harris, Clancy Brown. Science fiction adventure in which a futuristic, militarised Earth is threatened by regiments of giant insects from outer space. When an idealistic teenager enlists in the army in order to become a citizen, he is put through a brutal training programme to prepare him for the horrors of war. Sent to the distant planet Klendathu, he and his fellow troopers fight the deadly enemy force(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A photographer who witnessed his famous mountaineer father's death as a child must face his fears and rescue his sister who is trapped on K2 at 26,000 feet. Feeling responsible for his father's fatal accident, the young man had given up climbing but when his sister and her team become trapped after an avalanche, he must enlist the help of experts in order to save the group(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore stars in this lively costume romance that breathes new life into the traditional story of the beautiful Cinderella. In 16th century Europe, Danielle endures an unhappy life with her mean stepmother but finds she has a chance for happiness through an encounter with the handsome Prince Henry. However, with so much separating the lowly Danielle from her Prince, it seems that she doesn't stand a chance of living happily ever after(n)

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: British agent James Bond investigates the disappearance of an Anglo-American space shuttle which has fallen into the hands of a billionaire megalomaniac intent on world domination. Along the way, Bond has to contend with giant, steel-toothed hitman Jaws before stowing away on a flight to a space station being used as a colony to breed a genetically pure race(n)

programme.title: Dr. No
programme.desc: Ian Fleming's suave secret agent 007 makes his big-screen debut in this cheeky and fast-paced spy thriller, the first of a long series of James Bond films. Dr. No is the film that made former body-builder Sean Connery a star. Actress Ursula Andress also made a splash as the bikini-clad seductress who rises from the sea to use Bond to get revenge upon Dr. No. Bond himself is also after No, who, according to Bond's boss M, is about to financially ruin the United States. Bond's search for the crazed extortionist leads him to Jamaica and gets him into a variety of potentially dangerous scrapes, that while nowhere near as elaborate as those in subsequent Bond films, are still exciting(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Guts. With Jupiter's draft status up in the air, Reggie has Missy tutor him, and it proves more difficult than she imagined. Cam and Allison's romance intensifies; and Reggie's business prospects expand(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Starts and Stops. In the Season 2 finale, Reggie second-guesses himself about representing Jupiter, but Cam is sure he's made an excellent decision about Allison. Meanshile, a crisis rocks the family(n)

programme.title: Eddie Murphy: Raw
programme.desc: Outrageous comic Eddie Murphy makes a triumphant return to the stand-up comedy stage, sharing his unique, raunchy humour with his fans at its unexpurgated best(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Action comedy sequel to the box-office smash. Hard-nosed cop Axel Foley is called back to LA to help his West Coast colleagues solve the 'Alphabet Crimes', and is soon on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit woman(n)

programme.title: Something Beneath
programme.desc: A priest-turned-environmental activist discovers a deadly beast lurking beneath the hotel where an ecological summit is being held, and he embarks on a mission to dispose of the creature before it preys on the guests(n)

programme.title: Best of the Best 3: No Turning Back
programme.desc: The action series continues, as Tommy Lee takes on a group of neo-Nazis in the American heartland(n)

programme.title: Fortress
programme.desc: A glossy high-tech, futuristic sci-fi exterior does little to conceal the fact that this gory actioner is little more than a cliche-ridden prison movie--a movie that found tremendous popularity internationally. Set amidst an overpopulated, oppressed future U.S., it centers on the struggles of a defiant young couple who decide to have a second baby after the first dies. Unfortunately, the law states that each woman can only have one child. It is irrelevant whether the child survives or not. The couple attempts to make it safely out of the country, but they are captured and sentenced to spend three decades in the dreaded, corporate-owned Fortress, a grim place where lasers replace iron bars and inmates are controlled via radio-operated pain-inflicting intestinal devices. Incorrigible prisoners are forced to have their identities erased by a "mind wipe" machine. The prison is controlled by a sadistic cyborg warden and a robot army. The warden wants to make the woman's baby into a cyborg too. The warden also finds the wife very attractive. Meanwhile the husband begins making friends with his cellmate in hopes of finding a way to disable the surveillance system in time to save his wife and somehow escape(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Ninja
programme.desc: Sho Kosugi plays Cho, a highly-accomplished ninja master who has sworn off his ninja ways and is living in L.A. Trouble follows him, however, because a bunch of ninja ne'er-do-wells threaten to kill his few family members and he must defend them. He takes a bunch of bad guys on and eradicates them(n)

programme.title: American Ninja
programme.desc: In the torrid heart of the Philippine jungle, a humble US Army private suddenly develops legendary skills and stealth. Believing he is the possessor of ancient martial artistry, he takes on the fearsome Black Ninja in a final duel(n)

programme.title: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation
programme.desc: Michael Dudikoff and Steve James stalk a drug kingpin who preys on marines. Larry Poindexter. Burke: Gary Conway(n)

programme.title: American Ninja 3: Blood Hunt
programme.desc: This, the third issue in the American Ninja series, stars karate expert David Bradley who goes to Japan for ninja training so he'll be able to avenge his father's murder. Once trained, he enters in an international karate contest held by some no-goods who'd like to get their hands on the world's toughest fella so they can try out a new artificial disease they've created. (They figure the best way to test the disease is upon the toughest guy they can find.) Most action occurs on a Caribbean island(n)

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
programme.desc: Johnny Messner, Kadee Strickland, Matthew Marsden, Morris Chestnut, Nicholas Gonzalez. (2004) Sequel with Matthew Marsden in which a team of scientists go in search of a flower which causes immortality. The local anacondas have already discovered its properties. Dir: Dwight H Little(n)

programme.desc: Robert Rodriguez ("Sin City") wrote and directed this rip-roaring homage to gory exploitation flicks, centering on a rag-tag group fighting for their lives after a bio-weapon mishap creates an army of flesh-eating zombies(n)

programme.title: Boys of Abu Ghraib
programme.desc: A young Army Reserve enlistee grows deeply disillusioned after becoming a prison guard at Abu Ghraib, where his commanding officer coerces him into using intense interrogation techniques on a terrified detainee who appears to have committed no crime. Before long, the soldier who joined the military to defend his country begins to unravel due to the inhuman treatment he witnesses on a daily basis(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A low-level CIA worker returns from lunch to find all his colleagues have been assassinated and goes on the run as he tries to discover who ordered the killings. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Leviathan
programme.desc: In George Cosmatos' sci-fi thriller, a team of oceanographers discovers a sunken Soviet submarine housing the murderous product of a genetic experiment gone horribly wrong(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Star-studded WWII classic, inspired by real characters and events. In the supposedly escape-proof Stalag Luft III, the Allied escape committee devise a daring plan to liberate hundreds of Allied POWs into occupied territory. Hiding civilian clothing, forged documents and three tunnels from the German guards is difficult enough, but there is also the small matter of tons of soil to dispose of. Steve McQueen's famous leap over the barbed wire on a motorcycle while being pursued by Nazi troops is one of the stand-out moments in cinema history(n)

programme.title: The Towering Inferno
programme.desc: Doug Roberts, Architect, returns from a long vacation to find work nearly completed on his skyscraper. But a fire breaks out in the building and the fire department must fight to save it(n)

programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Garbage Strike.
programme.desc: San Francisco's refuse collectors go on strike, plunging Adrian into a frenzy of loathing as rubbish begins piling up in the streets - and making it hard for him to concentrate on solving the murder of a union official. Unable to think rationally, he becomes convinced a rock star is the killer. Guest starring Alice Cooper as himself, and Chi McBride (Pushing Daisies).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Sharona's son Benjy witnesses a murder at a resort hotel, but cannot make anyone believe him except Adrian, who investigates the case with the help of an over-enthusiastic house detective. Guest starring Polly Draper (thirtysomething).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman is apparently killed in an earthquake, but Adrian is sure that he was murdered by his wife, and sets out to investigate. Unfortunately, it is not long before the trauma of an aftershock deprives him of the power of speech.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A rich businessman being investigated for investment fraud is allegedly kidnapped, but Brenda and the team suspect he may have staged his own abduction. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: After David shoots an unarmed murder suspect, investigator Sharon Raydor is brought in to carry out an internal inquiry and Brenda soon finds herself at odds with the newcomer. Detective drama, starring Corey Reynolds and Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The first instalment of a two-part crossover with NCIS: New Orleans sees the Washington, DC team co-operating with their colleagues from the Big Easy to investigate a spate of lethal poisonings on board a New Orleans-to-DC flight. All the evidence seems to point to missing chef Luca, who happens to be Abby's brother, so the two investigative services join forces to locate him, and find out why a private tech firm seems to have been targetted by the killer. Naval crime drama, guest starring Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The concluding instalment of a two-part crossover with the original NCIS series sees Sebastian joining Abby Sciuto in Washington, DC to pick through the forensic evidence relating to the aircraft murders. Meanwhile, DC agent Ellie Bishop heads to New Orleans to help Pride and his team track down the chief suspect - Abby's brother Luca. Naval crime drama, guest starring Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Red-Headed Stranger.
programme.desc: Country singer Willie Nelson is wrongly accused of murder - but fortunately Adrian is one of his biggest fans and resolves to prove him innocent. To complicate matters, the prosecution has a witness - a blind woman who claims she can identify the culprit by his voice.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Forced to make a nerve-racking cross-country flight with Sharona, a nervous Adrian whiles away the anxiety of the journey by studying his fellow passengers - and soon concludes that the Frenchman sitting across the aisle has just murdered his wife. programme.title: The Closer

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: Molly's Birthday. It's Molly's birthday and she doesn't want to make a big deal of things or get a big present, but she does have a wishlist of favours she'd like, e.g., have Mike make her breakfast in bed, etc. Meanwhile, Victoria invites her pot dealer to stay at the house while his house is being fumigated for termites. He's a nice enough guy but Molly gets frustrated because he's taking up space and interfering with her birthday. The real trouble begins when Mike accidently ingests some pot-infused ice cream and wanders off through the neighbourhood. As Molly and Victoria search for Mike, Molly has a talk with Victoria about how she needs to start cleaning up her act and get real about her life (opening the door to Victoria growing up a little.) Also, Carl has a new apartment but he's lonely. He invites over Samuel and does everything he can to prevent Samuel from leaving(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart the Genius. Academics have never been a priority for Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright), and when Mrs. Krabappel (voice of Marcia Wallace) hands out a standardized IQ test that will "merely determine your future social stature and financial success," Bart hedges his bets by swiping a test from class brain Martin Prince (voice of Russi Taylor) and putting his name on it. Bart is as surprised as anyone when "his" test results confirm he has a genius IQ (while Martin is revealed to not be especially bright), and suddenly the school's staff decides Bart's rebellious behavior and previous poor grades were merely a product of boredom and dissatisfaction. Bart is transferred from Springfield Elementary to the Enriched Learning Center for Gifted Children, and he discovers his father Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) has a new respect and admiration for him. But Bart finds life among the super-intelligent is rough sledding, and his brighter sister Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith) has a hard time believing her brother is a genius. "Bart the Genius" was first aired on January 14, 1990(n)

Under the older man's nurturing tutelage, the boy begins to tame a wild white colt, but fate proffers a series of setbacks just as real progress is being made. programme.desc: A boy leaves his urban home in search of a real tree, and meets the reclusive industrialist who first created the city. The hermit tells the story of a grumpy forest creature who tried to stop him destroying the trees, and inspires the youngster to undo the damage that has been done. Animated fantasy based on the children's book, with the voices of Danny DeVito, Zac Efron and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Mavericks
programme.desc: A teenager discovers a supposedly legendary stretch of shoreline famous for vast waves actually exists. He tracks down a famous surfer and asks for help in developing his skills to the point where he can successfully ride the challenging waters. Fact-based drama, starring Jonny Weston, Gerard Butler and Elisabeth Shue.(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: The inventor of an advanced form of intelligent robot is found dead, and the detective investigating the case is certain that one of the scientist's mechanical creations is responsible - but no one believes his theory because the robots have been programmed to prevent them from harming humans. Sci-fi thriller, inspired by the Isaac Asimov stories, starring Will Smith, Bridget Moynahan and Alan Tudyk.(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: Premiere. A series of devastating personal traumas leaves a woman feeling self-destructive and lost. After spending years behaving recklessly, she decides to turn things around by embarking on an epic, solo trek along America's Pacific Crest Trail, which gives her the time and space to reassess her existence. Drama based on a true story, starring Reese Witherspoon and Laura Dern.(n)

programme.title: Colombiana

Years later, she is still working for him as an assassin, but is secretly planning to avenge her parents' deaths. Action thriller, starring Zoe Saldana, Cliff Curtis, Michael Vartan and Lennie James.(n)

programme.title: We Are the Best

They find an unexpected kindred spirit in a born-again Christian girl, who has the musical talent they need. Drama based on Coco Moodysson's graphic novel, starring Mira Barkhammar, Mira Grosin and Liv LeMoyne. In Swedish.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Cleo

But the last thing he and the fated emperor expect is an assassination attempt from within Caesar's own circle of friends. Comedy, starring Amanda Barrie, Kenneth Williams, Sid James, Kenneth Connor, Jim Dale, Charles Hawtrey and Joan Sims.(n)

programme.title: Ramona and Beezus
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Ramona has a vivid imagination and an unfortunate habit of accidentally causing trouble for herself and everyone else. When her father is fired from his job, the family's lives are thrown into upheaval, and Ramona puts her mind to the task of making sure they do not lose their home. Comedy based on Beverly Cleary's series of books, starring Joey King and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: A family of four-inch-high people living beneath the floorboards of an ordinary human home help the owner's son fight back when a dastardly lawyer plans to demolish the house and make way for a luxury apartment block. Children's fantasy, starring John Goodman, Jim Broadbent, Celia Imrie, Flora Newbigin and Tom Felton.(n)

programme.title: Krull

Her fiance sets out in search of a mythical weapon to rescue her, aided by a band of thieves, a wise old hermit, a bumbling wizard and a mysterious Cyclops. Fantasy adventure, starring Ken Marshall, Lysette Anthony, Freddie Jones, Francesca Annis, Robbie Coltrane and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond and her daughter Paige prepare a care package full of mouthwatering dishes for Ladd's grandmother, Edna Mae.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond throws a surprise birthday lunch for her son Todd, including smashed burgers with onion strings and fry sauce, and chocolate brownies with strawberry and fudge sauces.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Wars
programme.desc: Contestants create cakes based around the DC Comics franchise, featuring characters such as Batman, Aquaman and Spiderman.(n)

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: The young chefs create dishes using snapper in the entree basket, and the finalists then find a playful pie in the dessert round.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the villages surrounding Toulouse in the French Pyrenees, an area renowned for its artisan food. He goes truffle-hunting and prepares an omelette with the pickings, learns how to make bread in the traditional way, and joins locals for a wild boar hunt. The chef also shows how to prepare tarte Tatin, Roquefort salad, confit of duck and a country-style terrine.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver focuses on dishes containing onions, garlic and leeks, using them to produce simple meals including a salad, soup, and roast pork with an onion and potato al forno. He also chats to a gardener about the health benefits of raw garlic.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver uses a variety of carrots in an Indian salad, demonstrates how they can be used to complement a pork chop and discovers why the vegetable is orange. He then prepares foil-roasted smoked beetroot with beef and a cottage cheese dressing.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking enjoys a smoked pork shoulder sandwich, a big hunk of meat cooked low and slow until succulent and tender.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking heads to the heart of Alabama to visit The American Barbecue Belt.(n)

programme.title: Jamie and Jimmy's Friday Night Feast
programme.desc: Actress and Britain's Got Talent judge Amanda Holden demonstrates her culinary skills by rustling up a moussaka in the kitchen, Jamie Oliver prepares two-way chicken for the weekend and Jimmy Doherty tries his hand at DIY kebabs. The duo also breathe life into another lost sweet classic - maid of honour tarts - which date back to the days of Henry VIII.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie Degel saves an owner who isn't making money at his restaurant, Vinny's Pizzeria in Boulder City.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Rick, owner of Weiland Brewery in Los Angeles, contacts Charles after noticing discrepancies in his beer supply. When mystery diners Brianna and Jamie investigate, they discover a large scale bootlegging operation is taking place right under the owner's nose.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The Mystery Diners discover the classroom at the The Real Food Academy in Miami Shores, Florida is being used for personal business by the instructors.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Hilda sees Anne climbing over Paul's garden fence and thinks she is having an affair. Comedy, starring Richard Briers.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: As part of the centre's Energy Conservation Week, Colin designs a methane reclamation system for human bio-waste. Chris Barrie, Michael Burns and Tim Marriott star.(n)

programme.sub-title: Barry Becomes a Psychopathic Killer but Only Part-Time.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Things to Do When Your Wife Runs Off with a Turkish Waiter.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Beware of Laughing at Nora's Hats.

programme.title: Marley's Ghosts
programme.desc: In an attempt to make a fresh start, Marley decides to move house, and she and her three accompanying ghosts face a whole host of trials and tribulations as they come to terms with living under the same roof. Ex-lover Michael especially faces problems as his past comes back to haunt him. Comedy, starring Sarah Alexander, John Hannah, Jo Joyner and Nicholas Burns.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: The day of the wedding arrives and Bryn is still behaving oddly around Stacey's brother. Nessa debates whether to share her big secret and Smithy resolves to give a superb best man's speech - but finds himself overcome with emotion under the spotlight. Mathew Horne and Joanna Page star.(n)

programme.title: The Fast Show
programme.desc: Unlucky Alf attempts to propose to his girlfriend and football expert Ron Manager is lost for words. Sketch show, with Paul Whitehouse, Charlie Higson, Mark Williams and John Thomson.(n)

programme.sub-title: Greg Davies, Hal Cruttenden and Simon Evans.
programme.desc: Inbetweeners and Man Down star Greg Davies plays host for another session of stand-up at Hammersmith Apollo in west London, warming up the audience before comedy circuit regulars Hal Cruttenden and Simon Evans take the mic.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Agnes needs someone to look after Grandad so she can treat herself to a much-needed holiday - but with private nursing homes being so expensive, it seems her only option is to convince the health visitor he has lost his marbles. Rory and Dino move in for a couple of weeks, and the matriarch is soon spitting feathers when the latter begins taking over the house, and her late husband gets in touch from beyond the grave with some ominous news. Hit comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: As Richie and Eddie prepare for their holiday in sunny Doncaster, they decide to tone up their muscles to impress the ladies. However, their ways of achieving trim figures are unconventional to say the least. Comedy, with Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob continue their culinary tour of the north of England in the Lake District. Starring Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark and Jeremy enjoy their final days of freedom before Sophie's baby is born, determined to ignore the fact that one of them is the father. Mark makes the most of his extra wealth and power after being promoted, spending money on the flat, trying to get Jeremy a job, and pursuing company IT girl Dobby - but his plans go awry during a routine fire drill. Starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Rock & Chips
programme.desc: Only Fools and Horses prequel. Christmas 1960, and money is tight for the Trotters, so Joan decides to go back to work soon after giving birth to baby Rodney - but a chance meeting with jailbird Freddie, who has been released on bail, looks set to rekindle old passions. Meanwhile, Del's love life is in a tangle as he is about to get engaged three times in the same week. Nostalgic comedy drama, starring James Buckley (The Inbetweeners), Kellie Bright and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)
