programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: The late Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller, starring John Travolta and Denzel Washington. It's a day that the passengers on a New York subway train are unlikely to forget. And it's one that could rescue the professional life of subway employee Walter Garber, whose glittering career has been derailed by allegations of corruption. Garber is languishing on duty as a train dispatcher when all hell breaks loose after one of the Lexington Avenue line trains is hijacked by a gang led by the supremely self-assured, calmly ruthless Ryder. Ryder issues a demand for $10m and makes it clear that he won't hesitate to kill anyone who gets in his way. Garber and NYPD hostage negotiator Lieutenant Camonetti attempt to get to grips with the crisis but, as events progress, suspicions arise as to whether there's more to the hijacking than first meets the eye. Also starring James Gandolfini as New York's mayor and Luis Guzmán as a disgruntled subway worker who has joined Ryder's gang(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Drama about successful asset manager Derek, whose life becomes a living hell when he hires a beautiful but apparently unhinged temp. As office temp Lisa becomes more fixated with her boss, she goes to increasingly extreme lengths to win his attention. As flirting turns into aggressive come-ons and fully fledged stalking, Derek's wife realises that a fight is on to keep her family from the blonde's clutches(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A Scottish heroin addict tries to kick the habit, but struggles because of out-of-control mates(n)

programme.title: Unsullied
programme.desc: A track star must use her training to escape from two violent kidnappers after she is abducted when her car breaks down in rural Florida(n)

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Love emerges amongst a pending aquatic catastrophe in this romantic fantasy drama from director and co-screenwriter Stephen Chow. Written by Chow and Hing-Ka Chan, The Mermaid tells the story of a man named Xuan (Chao Deng), whose plans to build estates in the sea are halted by the lovely Shan (Yun Lin), who is sent to dissaude Xuan on behalf of the mermaids. Xuan's heart is swayed, but the pair soon finds that there are even bigger problems, and enemies, facing the mermaids(n)

programme.title: Surfer, Dude
programme.desc: Hands on a Hard Body director S.R. Bindler directs this wave-twisting tale of a soul-searching surfer (Matthew McConaughey) in the midst of an existential crisis. Steve Addington (McConaughey) is an herb-toking long-boarder with a keen sense of balance and a mellow outlook on life. Upon returning to his hometown of Malibu to spend the summer with old friends, Steve begins to sense that the good vibes he remembers as a boy have been hopelessly corrupted by the powers that be. When the earthen surfer is faced with the prospect of expanding into virtual-reality video games and reality television or risk being rendered irrelevant, he opts to keep riding the majestic Southern California waves rather than participate in this new digital reality. Fate seems to intercede, however, when the ocean simply ceases to produce any suitable waves. His finances dried up, his sponsored expense accounts suddenly canceled, and his friends flocking off to bluer pastures, the surfer without a wave suddenly realizes that he has but two choices in life: he can either sit tight and try to keep his sanity until the waves come rolling in again, or finally give in to the Man and his intoxicating world of artificial amusements. Perhaps with a little wisdom from his trusted manager (Woody Harrelson), his aging mentor (Scott Glenn), his guardian angel (Willie Nelson), and his newfound muse (Alexie Gilmore), Addington can somehow manage to maintain his mellow just long enough to put it all into perspective and get back to the basics(n)

programme.title: Blonde Ambition
programme.desc: Endearing romantic comedy about a small-town sweetheart (a delightfully charming Jessica Simpson) who heads to New York City to catch up with her boyfriend, who is cheating on her, and stays to take a job with a big company, where she finds love with a handsome employee (Luke Wilson) and becomes a pawn in a corporate power struggle. Country-music legend Willie Nelson costars as Simpson's grandfather. Directed by Scott Marshall (son of Garry Marshall)(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
programme.desc: Tim Allen returns as a regular guy-turned-Jolly Old Elf in the second sequel to the 1994 hit The Santa Clause. Scott Calvin (Tim Allen), who doubles as Santa Claus, has settled into his home at the North Pole with his new wife, Carol (Elizabeth Mitchell), and is preparing for another Christmas when he receives a visitor -- Jack Frost (Martin Short), the cold-weather sprite who has been sent to help out St. Nick by Mother Nature (Aisha Tyler) and Father Time (Peter Boyle) after making a scene at a meeting of the Council of Legendary Figures. However, while Jack is supposed to acting as an assistant to Santa, he has a habit of making things go haywire, and as it happens this is no mistake -- Jack is hoping that an exasperated Santa will quit his position so Jack can take over and finally have a holiday he can bend to his will. Meanwhile, Scott has invited Carol's parents, Bud (Alan Arkin) and Sylvia (Ann-Margaret), over for a long-promised visit, but since he needs to keep his other identity a secret, he and his elves are forced to go to great lengths to convince them that they're actually in Northern Canada. Wendy Crewson, Judge Reinhold, and Spencer Breslin also reprise their roles from the first two Santa Clause films(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: An injured soldier returns home to spend Christmas with his family after serving overseas, also hoping to track down his lost love. He finds his siblings have problems of their own to cope with, while his mother is planning to divorce his secretive father(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Joaquin Phoenix plays Johnny Cash, and Oscar-winner Reese Witherspoon plays June Carter in James Mangold's acclaimed biographical film about country music's legendary "man in black". The film follows Cash from his childhood, where he was touched by tragedy, through his years on the road to his marriage to June Carter, who was country royalty, and their struggle to find happiness as she weans him off booze and drugs. Walk the Line is a warts-and- all biopic, showing Cash's faults as well as his undoubted star quality as one of the greatest singer/ songwriters that America has ever produced(n)

programme.title: My Blind Brother
programme.desc: A slacker named Bill lives in the shadow of his more-successful brother Robbie, a blind athlete and local celebrity. When the pair both fall for the same woman, Bill must compete against his arrogant sibling for the first time in this hilarious comedy(n)

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: Set in the 1950s, the story of a young man who enters a prestigious prep school on an athletic scholarship and doesn't quite fit in with the upscale, anti-semitic crowd(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: An outcast leads his fellow nerds in a war of pranks against campus jocks who have taken over their frat house(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Musical about murder, celebrity, adultery, flashy lawyers, starry-eyed chorines and all that jazz(n)

programme.desc: Flamboyant Hollywood remake of the 1979 French farce La Cage Aux Folles. When his son's conservative future in-laws come to town, gay club owner Armand and his cross-dressing partner Albert are forced to play husband and wife(n)

programme.desc: Two irreverent losers combine basketball and baseball to invent a new gross-out sport. Their outrageous creation quickly moves from their driveway to sold-out stadiums across the nation, attracting unwanted attention from ruthless corporate interests that control professional sports. Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Yasmine Bleeth, Jenny McCarthy, Robert Vaughn, Ernest Borgnine, Dian Bachar(n)

programme.desc: Musical about murder, celebrity, adultery, flashy lawyers, starry-eyed chorines and all that jazz(n)

programme.title: Son of Saul
programme.desc: Saul, a Hungarian prisoner, is assigned to burn the corpses of his own people in one of the Auschwitz Crematoriums. He finds moral survival when he tries to secure a proper Jewish burial of his son(n)

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A trio of cops hunt for the truth when a Japanese call-girl's murder is recorded on videotape. Thriller(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Edward Norton duke it out in this stylish and provocative social satire. Norton plays a frustrated white-collar worker who joins a brutal club led by Tyler (Pitt) whose members relieve their aggression by beating each other to a pulp. Directed by David Fincher. Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf Aday(n)

programme.desc: Musical about murder, celebrity, adultery, flashy lawyers, starry-eyed chorines and all that jazz(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A Scottish heroin addict tries to kick the habit, but struggles because of out-of-control mates(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A trio of cops hunt for the truth when a Japanese call-girl's murder is recorded on videotape. Thriller(n)

Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf Aday(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: An undercover agent is taken under the wing of boss Lefty(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Wentworth Prison. At Wentworth Prison, Jamie's execution day approaches, while Claire and the Highlanders contemplate a rescue plan(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: To Ransom a Man's Soul. a risky escape attempt is engineered to free Jamie, and he's taken to a nearby monastery, where Claire attempts to nurse him back to health, both his mind and body(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: In this riveting adaptation of the best-selling novel, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks to unravel a mystery involving Dante's "The Divine Comedy" and stop a terrorist from unleashing a devastating biological weapon(n)

programme.title: Of Mice and Men
programme.desc: Second version of John Steinbeck's classic tale set in central California during the Depression. Lennie - powerful and slow-witted but gentle - and his self-appointed guardian George are itinerant farm labourers who dream of owning a ranch where they can be left in peace and Lennie can care for the animals he loves. But Lennie does not know his own strength, and his violent outbursts force the pair to keep on the move(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Quiet diplomat Justin searches for answers when his activist wife is murdered in Kenya. Rachel Weisz won an Oscar for her remarkable performance in John Le Carré's thrilling murder mystery(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this drama was adapted from the life of Brandon Teena, born Teena Brandon, a woman who chose to live her life as a man and suffered tragic consequences as a result. In 1993, 20-year-old Brandon (Hilary Swank) leaves Lincoln, Nebraska for the nearby community of Falls City, where she sports a crew cut, favors jeans and boots, and is regarded as a man by most of the people in town. While Brandon's friend Lonny (Matt McGrath) warns her that sexual outsiders aren't looked upon kindly in Falls City, she develops a reputation for being something of a ladies' man, and is soon living with a single mother named Candace (Alicia Goranson). But when Brandon meets teenage Lana (Chloe Sevigny), the two become romantically involved almost immediately. Brandon makes friends with Lana's mother (Jeanetta Arnette) and a burly ex-con named John (Peter Sarsgaard). John and his buddy Tom (Brendan Sexton) run with a rough group of men who like to drink and carouse, and they accept Brandon as one of their own. However, when Brandon ends up in jail on a traffic violation, her secret comes out, and, while Lana stands by Brandon's side, John and Tom feel betrayed -- and their anger soon boils over into violence. A distinguished feature debut for director Kimberly Peirce, Boys Don't Cry was enthusiastically received in its showings at 1999 film festivals in Venice, Toronto, and New York(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: Le passé
programme.desc: An Iranian man returns to Paris to finalise his divorce, but gets caught up in a family dispute involving his wife's daughter from a previous relationship(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This free-form biopic of jazz musician Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An idealistic FBI agent goes deep undercover within a white-supremacy group in order to bring down the organization from the inside(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: In this riveting adaptation of the best-selling novel, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks to unravel a mystery involving Dante's "The Divine Comedy" and stop a terrorist from unleashing a devastating biological weapon(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: An ex-con receives a message from God that he must head to Pakistan and bring Osama bin Laden to justice. However, his bizarre journey draws the attention of US forces stationed in the Middle East, who are baffled and annoyed by his vigilante quest(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Training Day director Antoine Fuqua takes viewers on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation, loyalty, and duty while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie Dugan (Richard Gere) is days away from retirement, but he's been burnt-out for years. Unable to remember why he signed up for the job in the first place, all Eddie can think about is retreating to his fishing cabin in Connecticut, and forgetting the horrors that he's seen during his decades on the job. At the same time, undercover narcotics cop Clarence "Tango" Butler (Don Cheadle) is right in the thick of it. As hard as he tries to quit, however, his superiors always find a way of keeping him on the job. Much like Dugan, he's lost sight of his priorities, and these days Tango's loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. And Tango isn't the only cop who's being drawn to the dark side of the law; narcotics officer Sal Procida's (Ethan Hawke) wife is currently pregnant with twins, and he's barely making enough to keep his family afloat. When Sal learns that his wife is at risk of losing their unborn children, desperation drives him to consider unethical means of ensuring financial stability. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene as the NYPD attempts to clean up the BK projects, the epicenter of lawlessness in the highest-crime precinct(n)

programme.title: Making a Killing: Guns, Greed, and the NRA
programme.desc: A study of the impact of gun sales in the United States(n)

programme.title: Sleuth
programme.desc: Faulty remake of the Broadway hit involving deadly cat-and-mouse games between a writer (Michael Caine) and his wife's lover (Jude Law)(n)

programme.desc: A chronicle of the Rolling Stones' tour through Latin America is highlighted by their free concert in Havana(n)

programme.title: The Rolling Stones Olé Olé Olé: A Trip Across Latin America
programme.desc: This documentary follows the Rolling Stones during a 2016 tour of Latin America, which ends with a massive concert in Havana—their first time ever performing in Cuba(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialize in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: A black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.desc: Faulty remake of the Broadway hit involving deadly cat-and-mouse games between a writer (Michael Caine) and his wife's lover (Jude Law)(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.desc: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A spy who tries to keep his profession a secret from his spouse fights international bad guys while attempting to win his wife back from a salesman who is trying to steal her away(n)

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: A pair of hapless cavemen are banished from their village and embark upon an epic journey through the Stone Age(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently-widowed man's son calls a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a partner(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks' classic sci-fi parody, starring Mel himself, Bill Pullman, Rick Moranis, John Candy and Joan Rivers. Packed full of more hilarious in-jokes than you can shake a lightsabre at(n)

programme.title: Company Business
programme.desc: It's nonstop action and suspense as two spies - one American, one Soviet - form an unlikely alliance when the CIA and KGB unite to assassinate them(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down high school sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest. Contains strong language/sexual scenes(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently-widowed man's son calls a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a partner(n)

programme.title: Let's Go to Prison
programme.desc: Bob Odenkirk's jail comedy Let's Go to Prison!, stars Will Arnett as Nelson Biederman IV, the son of a judge who ends up being sentenced to serve time in Rossmore State Penitentiary. During one of his rare stints out of incarceration, career criminal John Lyshitski (Dax Shepard) learns of the conviction. John holds a grudge against Nelson's father and decides to get his revenge by going back to jail and making Nelson's stay there as horrible as possible. Chi McBride co-stars as a fellow inmate(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A spy who tries to keep his profession a secret from his spouse fights international bad guys while attempting to win his wife back from a salesman who is trying to steal her away(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down high school sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest. Contains strong language/sexual scenes(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: The Ringer
programme.desc: A hilarious and heartwarming comedy about a loser with money problems who pretends to be a mentally challenged athlete to rig the Special Olympics(n)

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: A socially inept young woman slowly learns to overcome her insecurities in this sleeper hit from Australia. The unconventional Muriel (Toni Collette) is deeply unsatisfied with her life, stuck in the nowhere town of Porpoise Spit and feeling rejected by her friends and family. Believing herself unattractive and worthless, she seeks meager solace in ABBA songs and fantasies of gorgeous weddings, with herself as the bride. Muriel's life takes a turn for the better, however, when she befriends the carefree Rhonda (Rachel Griffiths), who encourages her to take control of her life. Together, the two women travel to Sydney, where a series of liberating experiences help Muriel develop self-esteem and take the first steps towards maturity(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent has an epiphany of conscience and is fired after he puts out a memo stating that he believes everyone in his firm should care more about their clients than the money they make(n)

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: A homeless woman parks her van in the driveway of playwright Alan Bennett's house and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Mike Myers and Dana Carvey star as Wayne Campbell and Garth Agar, lifelong friends who present their own cult cable show, Wayne's World, from a basement. Such is their success, slimy TV executive Ben Oliver plans to buy their show and turn it into a product-placement special. And to complicate matters, both Wayne and Oliver have fallen for foxy singer Cassandra. Based on characters first seen on Saturday Night Live, Myers' script and Penelope Spheeris' direction created an unlikely comedy, which sees the nerds inherit the earth as well as giving rise to a whole host of catchphrases(n)

programme.title: Grandma's Boy
programme.desc: Can the world's oldest adolescent maintain his cool while living with his grandmother? Alex (Allen Covert) is a 35-year-old video-game fanatic who gave up a career in accounting to take a job testing games for Brainasium, the company behind the wildly popular game "Eternal Death Slayer." While Alex took a big pay cut to land his dream job, he's happy with his work and is making ends meet -- until he discovers that his roommate hasn't paid the rent for the last six months, using the money to finance repeated visits to a local massage parlor. After running out of friends who will let him sleep on their couch, Alex swallows his pride and moves in with his grandma Lily (Doris Roberts), who loves Alex and is happy to give him a place to stay in exchange for doing chores around the house. Lily shares her home with two friends, perpetually confused Bea (Shirley Knight) and sexually adventurous Grace (Shirley Jones), and between the three of them, there's always work to be done, keeping Alex busy nearly every night. While Alex tells his co-workers he's living with three attractive women who are running him ragged, they don't know the real story; in the meantime, Alex is trying to charm Brainasium's beautiful new executive, Samantha (Linda Cardellini), while butting heads with the firm's space-case CEO Cheezle (Kevin Nealon) and J.P. (Joel David Moore), a teenage game designer who is no longer in touch with reality. Grandma's Boy was the first feature film from director Nicholaus Goossen(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Postcards From The Edge is about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of a very surreal place - hollywood. The film follows Suzanne Vale (Merrill Streep), an actress who struggles to rebuild her life after a stint in a drug rehabilitation clinic following a near fatal overdose. Upon her release from rehab Suzanne is dismayed to learn that because of her history of drug use and the undependable track record that resulted, the only way she can be hired for a film she is anxious to do is if a "responsible party" agrees to house and supervise her for the duration of the movie's shooting schedule. For Suzanne this requires moving back into the Beverly Hills home of her mother, Doris Mann(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two moronic brothers try to make an impact at the hippest joint in town(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You Lied To My Face. As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Also spotlighted: Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens; and when Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion(n)

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules
programme.desc: A former magazine editor writes a relationship guide for men after his fiancée leaves him(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Maya Forbes autobiographically inflected Infinitely Polar Bear stars Mark Ruffalo as Cameron, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder. After a breakdown forces him to leave his family and move into a halfway house, he attempts to rebuild a relationship with his two daughters, and win back the trust of his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana). When Maggie opts to go to business school in New York, they decide that he will move back in and take care of the day-to-day needs for the kids. Due to his mercurial nature, this leads to a series of quirky, funny, and sometimes frightening episodes. Infinitely Polar Bear screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: With this complex and intelligent political thriller, director Sydney Pollack returned to territory that he mined so well in "Three Days of the Condor" and "Havana." Nicole Kidman plays a UN worker who believes she overheard an assassination plot to eliminate a ruthless African dictator, and Sean Penn costars as the federal agent who may or may not believe her. This was the first feature film ever shot inside the United Nations' Manhattan headquarters. Catherine Keener, Earl Cameron(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: War drama starring Matthew Broderick and Denzel Washington, and adapted from letters sent by Colonel Robert G Shaw, an officer in the Federal Army during the American Civil War. Shaw volunteered to lead the first company of black soldiers, and had to face the bigotry of both the army's enemies and of his fellow officers(n)

programme.title: The Great White Hype
programme.desc: Charismatic Fred Sultan manages undefeated heavyweight James but can't drum up a fight for his man. If he can't find a boxer brave enough, he can always play the black-white card(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: A Los Angeles detective encounters high strangeness in his search for a missing woman and a 30-million-dollar cache of diamonds in this off-beat mystery thriller from Otis director Tony Krantz. Ned Cruz (Antonio Banderas) is the kind of detective people come to when all of their other resources have run dry. Approached by paroled Russian boxer Anton (Robert Maillet) to track down his elusive girlfriend, Lexie (Sienna Guillory), and recover the stash of diamonds she has stolen, Detective Cruz calls on all of his connections to get the job done. Eventually, his investigation leads him from a kinky Hollywood action icon (James Van Der Beek) to a multi-talented pornographer (Snoop Dogg) and a physics-obsessed waitress (Autumn Reeser) with an insatiable sexual appetite. Ned's hard work starts to pay off, however, when he ventures deep into the New Mexico desert, where an eccentric billionaire (Sam Elliott) and a brilliant physicist (Jimmi Simpson) have hatched a plan to recreate the Big Bang. Now, with the cops hot on his tail and a potentially catastrophic experiment unfolding right beneath his feet, Ned races to find the girl and recover the diamonds before the world comes to an end(n)

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: At the center of the galaxy, an asteroid collides with the storm-tossed sun, sending powerful electromagnetic waves shimmering across the universe toward Earth. Dr. Austin Shepard observes in horror, through a powerful telescope, as the waves of electromagnetic radiation are heading for earth. He fears for the disastrous consequences it may have on the entire planet. (Part 2 of 2)(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this continuation of the epic space opera saga, a downed stormtrooper goes on a journey reconnecting him with heroic faces from the past(n)

programme.title: The Great White Hype
programme.desc: Charismatic Fred Sultan manages undefeated heavyweight James but can't drum up a fight for his man. If he can't find a boxer brave enough, he can always play the black-white card(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: In an inspired bit of casting, Will Smith plays John Hancock, a disgraced, alcoholic superhero who gets a much-needed image makeover from an idealistic publicist (Jason Bateman). Peter Berg ("Friday Night Lights") directed this fast-paced action comedy. Charlize Theron, Eddie Marsan, Jae Head(n)

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: A talented yet troubled dancer attempts to turn her life around by focusing on her one true passion, and trains a scrappy young crew to compete against one of the best dance troupes in the country in this high-energy sequel from original Honey director Bille Woodruff. Maria Bennett (Katerina Graham) is in danger of wandering down a dark path when she decides to return to the Bronx, and become a professional dancer. With the support of Honey's mother Connie (Lonette McKee), Maria lands a decent job, and begins training in the same studio where she learned her first moves. Later, eagle eyed volunteer Brandon recognizes Maria's talent, and recruits her to help whip a promising young dance troupe known as the HD's into shape. But temptation soon rears its head in the form of Maria's ex-boyfriend Luis, the leader of the acclaimed 718 crew, and a fierce dancer who doesn't take competition lightly. Recognizing her one true chance to break free of Luis' influence and stay positive, Maria joins the HD's and prepares to go toe-to-toe with reigning champs the 718's on national television. Now if Maria and her underdog crew can just come out on top, she'll finally be able to cut her ties from the past, and follow in the footsteps of her idol Honey(n)

programme.title: The Visitor
programme.desc: Recently widowed economics professor Walter Vale reluctantly agrees to give a lecture in New York. programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A woman realizes that friends can be lovers, but now has to convince the friend in question in this romantic comedy. Michael O'Neal (Dermot Mulroney) and Julianne Potter (Julia Roberts) were romantically involved in college, and after breaking up, they have managed to remain close friends. For years, Julianne and Michael have had a pledge that if both were single when they turned 28, they would get married. Shortly before her 28th birthday, Julianne is lamenting the sad state of her love life when she gets a call from Michael, who announces that he has important news. Julianne is convinced that Michael is going to ask her to marry him, and she is crestfallen when he announces that he's engaged to Kimmy Wallace (Cameron Diaz). Kimmy seems like the perfect woman for Michael; she's sweet, pretty, bright, and adores Michael, and her wealthy family is just as fond of him as she is. But now that Julianne has realized how much she loves Michael, she's not about to give him up without a fight -- and isn't afraid to fight dirty. Julianne's uneasy ally in the battle for Michael's affections is her friend and editor George Downes (Rupert Everett), a cheerfully out-of-the-closet homosexual who is not prepared when Julianne asks him to pose as her boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Bobby Jones: Stroke of Genius
programme.desc: Based on the real-life story of golf legend Bobby Jones, Bobby Jones, Stroke of Genius features Jim Caviezel as the temperamental but highly talented amateur who threw a wrench in the golf world of the mid-'20s. Though Jones would eventually become the founder of the internationally renowned Augusta National Golf Club, which is father to the prestigious annual tournament known as The Masters, the combination of his ambition and tumultuous relationship with the media interfered with his personal life to such an extent that his future in the sport seemed doomed. With the help of his wife, Mary Malone Jones (Claire Forlani), the gifted, oftentimes tortured golfer was forced to balance his family life and the public scrutiny regarding his golf career, lest both of them dissolve entirely. Directed by Rowdy Herrington, the film also stars Jeremy Northam, Aidan Quinn, and Malcolm McDowell(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: The All-American Girls' Professional Baseball League was founded in 1943, when most of the men of baseball-playing age were far away in Europe and Asia fighting World War II. The league flourished until after World War II, when, with the men's return, the league was consigned to oblivion. Director Penny Marshall and screenwriters Lowell Ganz and Babaloo Mandel re-create the wartime era when women's baseball looked to stand a good chance of sweeping the country. The story begins as a candy-bar tycoon enlists agents to scour the country to find women who could play ball. In the backwoods of Oregon, two sisters -- Dottie (Geena Davis) and Kit (Lori Petty) -- are discovered. Dottie can hit and catch, while Kit can throw a mean fastball. The girls come to Chicago to try out for the team with other prospects that include their soon-to-be-teammates Mae Mordabito (Madonna), Doris Murphy (Rosie O'Donnell), and Marla Hooch (Megan Cavanagh). The team's owner, Walter Harvey (Gary Marshall) needs someone to coach his team and he picks one-time home-run champion Jimmy Dugan (Tom Hanks), who is now a broken-down alcoholic. After a few weeks of training, as Dugan sobers up, the team begins to show some promise. By the end of the season, the team has improved to the point where they are competing in the World Series (which is no big deal, since there are only four teams in the league)(n)

programme.title: From Justin to Kelly
programme.desc: Musical romance about a small-town Texan girl who ditches her deadbeat job for a holiday on the beach in Florida. Kelly falls for a party promoter, but her new friend Kaya is secretly plotting to steal him away. The two leads reached the final of reality TV series American Idol(n)

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: Ken Kwapis's comedy is set in the swish Majestic Hotel, run by a fierce Faye Dunaway, eagerly awaiting a hotel inspector who may award six-star status. So the manager has to be on topform while coping with his son's insistence there's an orang-utan on the loose. But he's right - master crook Rupert Everett has sneaked the trained ape in to commit a series of audacious burglaries - and once Alexander realises the truth, the only hope is that animal expert Paul Reubens (previously known as Pee Wee Herman) will capture the simian before the inspector realises anything is wrong(n)

programme.title: Accidents Caught on Camera with HD Mirror Cam!
programme.desc: See crazy accidents caught on camera with the HD Mirror Cam - the most important tool you'll ever own for your car! HD Mirror Cam turns any rearview mirror into a dash cam, and captures it all so if anything ever happens you always have the proof!(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Purple Testament. William Reynolds stars as Fitzgerald, a WWII army lieutenant with an unusual and most unwelcome gift. Much to his dismay, Lt. Fitzgerald can stare into the faces of his fellow soldiers and determine who among them will die in combat. Begging to be transferred, Fitzgerald finally gets his wish, but that's not the end of the story. The stellar supporting cast includes Dick York as Captain Riker, Barney Phillips as Capt. Gunther, Warren Oates as a jeep driver, and future director Paul Mazursky (in the first of his three Twilight Zone appearances). Written by Rod Serling, with a musical score by old CBS radio hand Lucien Moraweck, "The Purple Testament" originally aired February 12, 1960(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Elegy. Adapted for television by Charles Beaumont from his own short story, the Twilight Zone episode "Elegy" was first telecast February 19, 1960. Making an emergency landing on an Earth-like asteroid, three astronauts -- Webber (Kevin Hagen), Meyers (Jeff Morrow), and Kirby (Don Dubbins) -- are astonished to find that the little orb is fully populated by humans. Thing of it is, all of the humans are "frozen" in place, like wax statues. A seemingly harmless little man named Jeremy Wickwire (Cecil Kellaway), who is actually a robot, provides an explanation. . .and a few additional surprises. Van Cleave's musical score for "Elegy" would pop up in excerpt form in several future episodes(n)

programme.title: Battledogs
programme.desc: A werewolf virus has been unleashed in New York City, and now the world's only hope lies with an infected wildlife photographer (Ariana Richards) with a direct connection to the host, and an Army general (Craig Sheffer) who's determined to find the cure. Meanwhile, a rogue general (Dennis Haysbert) plots to create an army of werewolf super soldiers(n)

programme.title: Hellhounds
programme.desc: In 500 B.C.E., Greek warrior Kleitos must march into hell to rescue his bride, Princess Demetria, from the torments of the Underworld(n)

programme.title: Devil
programme.desc: Forced into a corner, backs against the wall - a season of action, suspense and dread in confined surroundings. Supernatural chiller starring Chris Messina as a cop who discovers that four people are trapped in a lift with the Devil incarnate. Dowdle and screenwriter Brian Nelson tackle the first instalment of "The Night Chronicles," a film series in which up-and-coming filmmakers bring to life stories conceived by M. Night Shyamalan. Devil opens as five Philadelphia office workers file into the lift of an office building. A security guard - who can see, but not hear, what's going on in the suspended box - tries to convince the cop on the case that one of the passengers is the Devil, taking human form in his quest to collect sinners. As emergency workers frantically try to open the lift, secrets are revealed and the five realise that their only hope for survival is to confess their darkest sins in front of the others(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Daredevil biker Johnny Blaze sells his soul and becomes the devil's fiery-skulled bounty hunter in this Marvel Comics adaptation(n)

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Extended director's cut of the sci-fi sequel unfolding a life-and-death battle to avert a nuclear holocaust. A supercomputer that sought to destroy mankind sends a shape-shifting cyborg back to our time to kill its enemy - the human resistance leader - in his youth. Aided by another cyborg, the boy and his mother try to alter the events that led to the computer's creation and the nuclear war which it triggered(n)

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: Paul Walker and Steve Zahn star in this well-paced thriller as two brothers whose road trip goes terribly awry. When a seemingly harmless prank backfires, the siblings become the prey of a psychotic truck driver on a highway to hell. Leelee Sobieski, Jessica Bowman, Brian Leckner, Jim Beaver. John Dahl "(Red Rock West") directed(n)

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit(n)

programme.title: Joy Ride 2: Dead Ahead
programme.desc: Closing this year's FrightFest Season is this horror sequel from director Louis Morneau. Betrothed couple Bobby and Melissa are driving across the States to get hitched in Las Vegas. In the car with them are Melissa's sister Kayla and her new boyfriend Nik. Their plans wobble when they break down in the desert, but pick up again when they find a roadworthy car they can 'borrow' to continue their journey. Unfortunately for them, someone has spotted them taking the car. Worse, that person is the sadistic, psychopathic trucker Rusty Nail. Now it's not a question of whether the friends will make it to Vegas, but whether or not they'll live to recount a blood-soaked tale of survival..(n)

programme.title: Joy Ride 3: Roadkill
programme.desc: A homicidal trucker chases street racers on their way to a competition(n)

programme.title: Killjoys
programme.desc: Necropolis Now. As Johnny faces off with someone from his past, Dutch faces her own personal hell(n)

programme.title: Dark Matter
programme.desc: Built, Not Born. A distress call from the Android's friend, Victor, leads to answers about Two's past(n)

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: Forever Mine Nevermind. Wynonna asks Doc to make an impossible choice. Waverly makes a new friend, and is terrorized by an old one(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Mirror Image. While waiting in a lonely bus station, Millicent Barnes (Vera Miles) is startled to discover that everyone in the station seems to know her. She is further amazed when, peering into the window of a passing bus, she spots a young woman who looks exactly like her. Figuring that Millicent is a mental case, Paul Grinstead (Martin Milner) humors her until the men in the white coats show up -- only to find out that the girl was telling the truth all along. A neat "matte shot" caps this eerie Rod Serling-scripted entry, based, believe it or not, on one of Serling's real-life experiences. First telecast February 26, 1960, "Mirror Image" was the 26th Twilight Zone episode to be filmed, but the 21st to be shown(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: All for Our Country. Conclusion. The investigation into the double homicide turns up two more murders and the evidence leads Grissom, Warrick and Nick to believe a police officer may be involved. Across town, Catherine and Sara probe the death of a college student found after several days in his still-running bathtub. Judge Slater: John Doman. Greg: Eric Szmanda. Robbins: Robert David Hall(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Homebodies. The mummified body of an old woman is found in the victim's closet. It was clearly no accident, and the woman was clearly alive when she was entombed. As Grissom (William L. Petersen) investigates, other CSI members look into a case involving a break-in, a teenaged girl, and a rape -- a case that has more in common with the aforementioned death of the old woman than first meets the eye. Likewise linked are two separate investigations conducted by Catherine (Marg Helgenberger) and Warrick (Gary Dourdan), both involving the same weapon(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Feeling the Heat. Catherine investigates the death of a baby who was left inside a locked car on a steamy day; Nick and Sara examine a lakeside scene where a young woman's body was found washed ashore; Warrick tries to determine whether a man found dead in a sweltering house was the victim of an accident or foul play. Sophia: Ryan Starr. Linda: Stacy Edwards. Mark: Cam Gigandet. Stone: Rick Ravanello. Morris: James Leo Ryan. Evelyn: Paula Newsome(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Fur and Loathing. Grissom and Catherine investigate a bizarre case in which a man dressed in a full-body raccoon suit is shot and then hit by a car along a dark stretch of highway. The woman driving the car is also killed when an 18-wheeler smashes into her vehicle. In town, Sara and Nick look into the murder of a man found shot and frozen in a warehouse's walk-in freezer(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

Their plans wobble when they break down in the desert, but pick up again when they find a roadworthy car they can 'borrow' to continue their journey. Unfortunately for them, someone has spotted them taking the car. Worse, that person is the sadistic, psychopathic trucker Rusty Nail. Now it's not a question of whether the friends will make it to Vegas, but whether or not they'll live to recount a blood-soaked tale of survival..(n)

programme.sub-title: Get the Dodge Out of Hell
programme.desc: Get the Dodge Out of Hell. En route to Wanker County, the Bundys take the Dodge to Traugott's Car Wash--where the old heap promptly disappears. This is unsettling enough, but it's nothing compared to the family's surprise when their former next-door neighbor Steve Rhodes (David Garrison) appears out of nowhere (Apparently it was a big surprise to the studio audience as well; when Steve comes into camera range, the spectators respond with longest sustained applause ever heard on the series!). Though advertised as Married. . .With Children's 200th episode, this is actually the 199th to be filmed; it was originally shown in tandem with The Best O' Bundy, a retrospective hosted by George Plimpton(n)

programme.desc: 25 Years and What Do You Get?. It's the Bundys' 25th anniversary, and Al (Ed O'Neill) celebrates the occasion by buying his wife Peggy (Katey Sagal) a diamond necklace--which is promptly buried in the backyard by family dog Buck. Meanwhile, Peg decides to give herself a little present by going to a luxurious spa, where she and Marcy (Amanda Bearse) are bowled over by a handsome attendant. Despite the Fox network's claims to the contrary, this is the 200th episode of Married. . .With Children(n)

This leaves Al (Ed O'Neill) and Peg (Katey Sagal) bobbing up and down in a tiny raft, accompanied by Marcy and Jefferson D'Arcy (Amanda Bearse, Ted McGinley), a plump female tourist named Joy (Hannah Eckstein), and the eternally "kvetching" comedian Gilbert Gottfried. programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: This lowbrow hit about the Bundys, TV's first family of raunch, made the new Fox network a player. The long-running series prospered despite threats of sponsor boycotts and the ire of some critics, who objected to the show's offbeat, sometimes coarse humor. TV Guide's reviewer, however, applauded the sharp, funny lines, calling the series an antidote to the 'hundreds of sugary [sitcoms] that have rolled blandly across American screens since the beginning of television time.'(n)

programme.desc: Guess Who's Coming to Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner. Married. . .With Children opens its tenth season as Bud (David Faustino) moves out of the Bundy household. Dad Al (Ed O'Neill) is delighted that he'll have one less mouth to feed--or at least, he was delighted until he found out that Bud was moving into the Bundy basement. As for Bud's former room, it is now occupied in every sense of the word by Peg's (Katey Sagal) overbearing mom (played by a never-seen Kathleen Freeman), prompting Al to head to Wanker county in hopes of persuading Peg's dad Ephraim (Tim Conway) to reconcile with his wife(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle (Bradley Cooper), the most-celebrated sniper in American military history. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children. As the story opens, we meet carefree brothers Chris and Jeff (Keir O'Donnell) as they work the Texas rodeo circuit. They're cowboys through and through, and despite being notably older than the usual enlistee, Chris pays a visit to his local recruitment office and decides to become a Navy SEAL. Later, at the firing range, he draws on his hunting lessons with his stern father to become an expert marksman. A booze-fueled barroom chat with pretty brunette Taya (Sienna Miller) soon leads to wedding bells, and following the terrorist attacks of 9/11, Kyle is deployed to Iraq for his first tour of duty. There, his reputation as a sniper who never misses makes him a legend among his fellow troops, and earns him the moniker "The Devil of Ramadi" from his enemies. With a substantial bounty on his head, Kyle makes it his personal mission to take out a sadistic Iraqi soldier known as "The Butcher," as well as an elusive enemy marksman with a skill to rival his own. The closer he gets to achieving his goals during repeat tours of duty, however, the more fellow soldiers he sees die, and the further he drifts from Taya and their two children back home. It all leads up to a tense rooftop gunfight in a raging sandstorm -- one that convinces the sniper once and for all to make his family his top priority. Unfortunately, all is not well as Kyle struggles to make the transition back to civilian life, but he discovers that helping his fellow veterans is an effective way to do good and make peace with his wartime experiences(n)

programme.title: Collateral

Foxx was nominated for Best Supporting Actor(n)
